entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 PM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 5:30 PM NDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: E 45 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast this evening. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming north 60 gusting to 90 near noon. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
